title: Did Sudafed in Trump’s Trump Tower Office Indicate Stimulant Abuse?
subtitle: A viral thread makes a series of factually suspect conclusions based off a blurry photo of three boxes of European Sudafed.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: A photograph of U.S. President Donald Trump in his Trump Tower office in 2016 with several boxes of Sudafed in the background provides credible evidence of stimulant abuse.
